revised_title: Investigation of the Attraction of a Galvanic Coil on a Small Magnetic Mass
tldr: The author investigates the attraction of a galvanic coil on a small magnetic mass, using Ampere's law to derive an expression for the potential at an external point of a closed circular galvanic current. The study focuses on the case of a galvanic current traveling through a wire coiled into a hollow cylinder and provides expressions for the forces acting on the magnetic mass.
